data.text: @leeleeCT @gorgepulse @MichaelPSenger Ps I have a Vizsla, but covered in shaggy hair
@leeleeCT @gorgepulse @MichaelPSenger Basically other ways of saying that the further you project, the more the errors accumulate?
@jonaustin182 @MichaelPSenger Read page 30 to 38 with all the side effects of Pfizer and then tell me why should "try" omicron was really took only 3 days for me.
@thatjerkme @ItsSamG @bringsnacks__ @MichaelPSenger I only said the last one of those things. Not sure I qualify as a kid either. I'm decidedly middle-age.
@swimmingthegrey @ItsSamG @kylenabecker @MichaelPSenger I have highlighted nothing in any colour... What are you talking about?

@QPdawll @timsoderberg @MichaelPSenger Nota Bene: "active viral presence"

There has been an astounding amount of mis-information and misunderstanding around Covid.

This includes the lazy categorisation "long-Covid".
There is no evidence for a persistent and active viral presence causing long-term symptoms.

@QPdawll @MichaelPSenger "Involving". I'll bet. 
Anyhoo if you look at the numbers involved: CDC claims 40m children have had it. So 851 deaths is 0.002% and as we know the 'diagnosing' of such deaths has not exactly been... rigorous https://t.co/JBrsVdOQCr
